featured.text: His heart transplant surgery was more successful than Anthony’s.
But Oddsson’s life was saved by a creative invention: transplanting codfish skins onto human bodies.
In the five years since his heart transplant, he had been on an exercise program where he regularly rode a bicycle for five miles, swam each day, and walked a couple of miles.
On Christmas Eve, 1992, Anthony had a heart transplant from a 21-year-old donor.
Two days before Valentine’s Day in 2002, Alfred received a 19-year-old heart, marking the first time on record that twin adults each received heart transplants.

definition.zh_def: 移植，將器官、組織或植物從一個地方移到另一個地方。
definition.en_def: To move an organ, tissue, or plant from one location to another.
definition.example: The doctor decided to transplant the kidney from a donor to the patient.
